Detailed Description

The basic interface to capture video streams is defined /vps/vps_capture.h This interface lists additional APIs / config control for ISS based capture. The interface to control h/w specifics are listed as part of starterware interface. Staterware interface are available via the ISS capture driver.

Warning
Following section describes the applicable parameters of generic capture.
  • Vps_CaptCreateParams.videoIfMode valid values are FVID2_VIFM_SCH_CSI2 FVID2_VIFM_SCH_LVDS FVID2_VIFM_SCH_CPI
  • Vps_CaptCreateParams.videoIfWidth valid values are When FVID2_VIFM_SCH_CSI2 - FVID2_VIFW_1LANES, FVID2_VIFW_2LANES, FVID2_VIFW_3LANES, FVID2_VIFW_4LANES When FVID2_VIFM_SCH_LVDS - FVID2_VIFW_4LANES When FVID2_VIFM_SCH_CPI - FVID2_VIFW_8BIT to FVID2_VIFW_16BIT
Following feature of generic capture interface is not supported. Use of these features would be treated as a wrong argument.
  • Capture IOCTL IOCTL_VPS_CAPT_SET_FRAME_SKIP is not supported by ISS based capture.
  • Buffer modes VPS_CAPT_BCM_CIRCULAR_FRM_REPEAT & VPS_CAPT_BCM_CIRCULAR_FRM_REPEAT is not supported.
  • Vps_CaptFrameSkip is not supported. i.e. frames cannot be skipped.
  • periodicCbEnable of Vps_CaptCreateParams is not supported.
  • muxModeStartChId of Vps_CaptCreateParams is not applicable.
  • descErrCount of Vps_CaptChStatus is not supported.
Note
To control each sub block of ISS capture, Please refer the interface specific header defined in starterware <vps/iss/vps_cfg*.h>

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct Vps_CaptIssOpenParams Vps_CaptIssOpenParams_t

Additional Open parameters required. Used to allocate sub-modules of CAL. The address of a instance of this structure should be specified.
